doc:
Brace Beemer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brace_Beemer 0 Brace Beemer (December 9, 1902 – March 1, 1965) was an American radio actor and announcer at radio station WXYZ (AM), Detroit, Michigan. He is best known as the radio voice of the Lone Ranger. Brace_Beemer ( December_9_,_1902 – March_1_,_1965 ) was an_American_radio_actor_and_announcer at radio_station_WXYZ ( AM ) ,_Detroit_,_Michigan . He is_best_known as the_radio_voice of the_Lone_Ranger .
